name: happycat
text: He probably got it off the DeLorean website. Hell, it's free. :D

name: drskradley
text: [url=http://www.delorean.com/store/search.aspx?SearchTerm=flux capacitor]LIES!!!![/url]

name: drskradley
text: Dammit, add a plus sign between "Flux" and "Capacitor".

name: em2
text: Check your local classified ads .

name: centipede_damascus
text: Lie Bot is from the future?!

name: soilentshuggah
text: Actually he's from.. history!

name: bron
text: Michael J. Fox probably has like 5 Flux Capacitors.

name: ambala
text: Excellent use of flux capacitor.

name: jokercross
text: Any use of flux capacitor is excellent.

name: ravindra108
text:
I'm giving you a chubby just for your avatar... Every time I see it I have to stare at it for a minute.

He's all "WoooowooooowooOOOOOOOOWOOOOOWOOOAAAAAAHHHHMYGODTHISSCALPISAMAZING!!!!!!"

Lame away, people!

name: ravindra108
text:
Damn... extra lames because I made that too long and assetbar cut it off.

Sorry everybody, I'll shut up now.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
What's worse than people thinking you're lame?
People straight-up not caring.

name: mortshire
text: i have a chubby for those shoes.

name: rowboat
text: Don't believe him. I know where he got those shoes .

name: f1shst1ck
text: I don't really understand why he's offended by Teodors complement but eh, its Achewood.

name: gothfae
text: Because he's Lie Bot

name: tekende
text: He's projecting? He lies all the time so he assumes everyone else lies to him as well.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: I think you're the one who's projecting here.

name: rasalghul
text:
I think Lie Bot is mock offended so he can lead the conversation to the point he can show off the flux capacitor he drew/built/stole. I think it's the reason he wore those shoes to begin with. Very crafty.

I'm kinda new to Achewood, but it doesn't often seem to occur that someone tells Lie Bot he's lying to them.

name: antsama
text: Lie bot is one of the more interesting characters only because his dialogue is so inexcusable all the time.

name: joeyramoney
text: i have a vibrator shaped like michael j fox.

name: saint
text: i have a michael j.fox shaped like a vibrator.

name: baryonyx
text: In Soviet Russia, Michael J. Fox has vibrator shaped like you.

name: heccibiggs
text: I'm a sucker for any "In Soviet Russia" jokes. I visited Minsk with my college in November, we tried to come up with as many as possible. Harder than you may think.

name: rowboat
text: In Soviet Russia, "In Soviet Russia" jokes come up with you!

name: bjorntd
text:
In America, you hunt for Red October,
In Soviet Russia, Red October hunts for YOU!

In America, you kill the party,
In Soviet Russia, the Party kills YOU!

In America, you are sentenced by a jury of your peers,
In Soviet Russia, a secret tribunal sentences you to a lifetime of hard labor in spartan gulags with minimal safety controls in the harshest reaches of the Siberian wastes, with no contact to your family such that they know not whether you are dead or alive when they gather up their tear-soaked belongings to defect to the West, slowly making a long journey across only to be machine-gunned by a nervous, underfed soldier at Checkpoint Charlie, freedom only meters away.

WHAT A COUNTRY.

name: brokeaccount
text:
And when you've only been in the gulag five damn minutes they shoot you full of drugs, wrap you up in chicken wire and pour black goop all over your face!

[IMGS OFF]

name: jonmw
text: what the hell is the chicken wire in aid of

name: rowboat
text: It's how Duchovny keeps himself young and pretty.

name: saint
text:
How does this only have 10 chubbies?

This is wonderful.

name: zapatos
text: In Soviet Russia, Zangief is worth using.

name: shoinan
text: In Soviet Russia, Zangief uses you.

name: saint
text: giant, speedo-clad man-children: NEVER OK

name: zapatos
text: read:  always.

name: hateandwar
text: Dude, Zangief is one of the best guys if you know what you're doing. Make good use of the double lariat and banishing fist and you can even take care of jerks who just do hadokens nonstop.

name: baryonyx
text: Personally my technique opens with a mongrel blow or an ollie kickflip and follow up with an inverted tumble-dryer. Make sure to buy some fenix downs first though.

name: history
text:
I actually stumbled across the movie Red Heat on HBO this weekend. God it was awful, but here's the quotable:

Arnie as the Russian: "Right after revolution, they round up all drug dealers, all drug addicts, take them to public square, and shoot them in back of head."

James Belushi as the renegade cop: "Ah, it'd never work here. Fucking politicians wouldn't go for it."

Arnie again: "Shoot them first."

name: aarongstock
text: That is hell of setup for one lie.

name: lolcatdeluxe
text: Naw, Lie Bot was lying about being offended. Then he lied about knowing Micheal J. Fox. Then he lied about the flux capacitor (it is probably fake). That's three. He is a pro.

name: chuchurocket
text: i find it odd yet appropriate that teodor's pants bear a stricking resemblance to a pair of hairy balls.

name: jonmw
text: I think that they were made from the nutsack of an elephant

name: chuchurocket
text: i also find it odd that i can't spell the word "striking".

name: deusoma
text: Sweet crap! Someone didn't believe Lie Bot!

name: brzbee
text: Lie Bot, i luv yous.

name: heyman
text: "Mr. Acid tongue" one of my favorite lie-bot-isms

name: fishies
text: Oh damn the layers! I always did think Lie Bot had insane shoes. They don't seem to fit him so I dunno maybe Michael J Fox DID give him the shoes.

name: snowman
text: Man, Lie Bot.

text: Fun Fact: Early Lie Bot's is voiced by Futurama 's Bender.

name: tekende
text: No, he is voiced by Tex Avery.

text: No, actually, it's the female reproductive system .

text: DAMN!

text: it's NOT the flux capacitor, it's the female reproductive system!

text: He just brought up Michael J. Fox as a way of showing off his new flux capacitor.

text: Lie Bot cannot travel more than 88 mph without risking time travel

text: i confused michael j. fox with jamie foxx until the last frame :(

name: sparhawk
text: Some neat brogues there.

name: mattylite
text:
On second look, I have decided this is, in fact, the greatest achewood strip.*
